DOC.brief_summary: Diminished ovarian reserve ( DOR ) disease cure . Medicine DOR include dehydroepiandrosterone ( DHEA ) , hormone replacement therapy ( HRT ) , immunosuppressive agent alternative therapy , etc . Electroacupuncture ( EA ) help patient regain regular menses , increase estradiol ( E2 ) level decrease follicle-stimulating hormone ( FSH ) decrease FSH/luteotropic ( LH ) ratio . In cohort study , aim observe effect EA versus therapy DOR .
DOC.criteria: Age young 40 yr 10IU/L ≤ FSH ≤ 40IU/L Volunteer join research give inform consent A history ovariectomy , receive cytotoxic chemotherapy irradiation Reproductive system infection tumor Autoimmune disease Amenorrhea due reproduction abnormality pregnancy Patients adhere treatment due personal situation Patients take immunosuppressive agent past 6 month receive treatment le 1 week withdrawal
